name: The Platform (MichaelD3v)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Alone on a small platform, high above the skies, equipped with just a grappler, players will need to learn how to survive in this strange and unknown place.

Resources are falling from the sky! Catch them using the grappler and use them to craft new items and extend your small starting platform into a huge base!

Be aware! Surviving is not an easy task in this world,  and you need to feed and hydrate yourself if you don't want to die. Also be careful, or you might find yourself falling from the platform into a terryfing and uknown abyss.

Features:

● Gather resources! Use the grappler to catch resources falling from the sky!

● Craft! Make tools, buildings and more to help you survive!

● Build! Extend your small platform into a huge, imposing base!

● Survive! Feed, hydrate and keep an eye opened all the time or something bad might happen!

You can also follow us on other platforms:

  • Youtube
  • Youtube (secondary chanel)
  • TikTok
  • Twitter
  • Discord
Install instructions
  1. Click "Download Now" button.
  2. Extract the files by right clicking the downloaded file  and choosing extract here. Make sure the .exe file and Data folder is in the same location.
  3. Run the .exe file.
